title: The 'Chandrika' Polki Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Enamel Detailing. Features the renowned Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a classic alternating design of circular and triangular motifs, each encrusted with meticulously set Polki diamonds. The centerpiece is a statement-sized, rose-cut Polki diamond pendant, surrounded by a halo of smaller Polkis. The design subtly incorporates traditional Telugu 'Addigai' elements with a contemporary twist. The back of the pendant is closed and has floral enamel work.
colors: Predominantly Gold and White (Diamond). Subtle hints of color in the enamel work.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Suitable for Seemantham
or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Its timeless elegance also makes it suitable for modern formal events.
description: Crafted with ethically sourced Polki diamonds and high-purity gold, this Haaram is an investment in both beauty and heritage. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures a long-lasting shine, while the unique design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary sensibilities. The substantial size of the Polki diamonds adds to its grandeur, making it a true heirloom piece. Offers unmatched brilliance and a regal look, embodying the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad.
